snippet: Rose’s ex-girlfriend testified about a night of drinking at the player’s Beverly Hills mansion and the incident that led her to file a lawsuit saying she was raped....
abstract: New York Knicks point guard Derrick Rose faces woman who accused him and two of his friends of rape in court; woman offers few details of encounter with men during her testimony, saying her memory was foggy because she was intoxicated; questions by both parties' lawyers focus on why she waited two years to sue, her relationship with Rose and circumstances that led to their encounter.
lead_paragraph: Rose’s ex-girlfriend testified about a night of drinking at the player’s Beverly Hills mansion and the incident that led her to file a lawsuit saying she was raped.

headline.main: Derrick Rose’s Accuser Testifies During an Emotional Day in Court
headline.print_headline: Emotional Day in Court as Rose Faces Accuser
